name: Melania
description:
The main character wakes up after a long sleep and discovers an empty planet where there are no living beings left. We have to explore locations and find out the reasons for the disappearance of civilization and solve puzzles.



Features of the game:
  • Gravity switching.
  • Deep plot.
  • Interesting puzzles.
  • Convenient operation.
  • Gloomy mystical atmosphere.
